Description.enUS: Infiltrator. Can use Personal Cloaking and call down Tactical Nukes built at the Nuclear Silo. **Can attack ground and air units**
Description.zhCN: Infiltrator. Can use Personal Cloaking and call down Tactical Nukes built at the Nuclear Silo. **Can attack ground and air units**
Description.koKR: Infiltrator. Can use Personal Cloaking and call down Tactical Nukes built at the Nuclear Silo. **Can attack ground and air units**

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам двигаться в указанную точку или следовать за указанной целью. При этом они не будут вступать в бой с возможным противником.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам прекратить выполнение всех задач и остановиться.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам оставаться на месте и атаковать противника в зоне досягаемости, при этом не преследуя его и не приближаясь к нему, чтобы вступить в бой.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам курсировать между текущей позицией и выбранной точкой. Обнаружив противника, они будут приближаться на расстояние атаки и вступать в бой.

Tooltip.enUS: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам двигаться в выбранную точку, вступая в бой с противниками, которые встретятся по пути. Указав в качестве цели конкретную боевую единицу, вы прикажете атаковать ее до уничтожения.

Tooltip.enUS:
Calls down a Nuclear Strike at a target location. Nukes take 20 to land, but they deal massive damage in a large radius.
Deals 2/3rds of the targets combined base vitals or 500 damage, whichever is greater.
Tooltip.zhCN:
Calls down a Nuclear Strike at a target location. Nukes take 20 to land, but they deal massive damage in a large radius.
Deals 2/3rds of the targets combined base vitals or 500 damage, whichever is greater.
Tooltip.koKR:
Calls down a Nuclear Strike at a target location. Nukes take 20 to land, but they deal massive damage in a large radius.
Deals 2/3rds of the targets combined base vitals or 500 damage, whichever is greater.

Tooltip.enUS: Fires a Lockdown round disabling a mechanical unit for 38 seconds. Affected units cannot attack, move or use abilities disabling passive Detection and Cloaking. May be removed by a Medic's Restoration**Cannot target Heroic targets**
Tooltip.zhCN: Fires a Lockdown round disabling a mechanical unit for 38 seconds. Affected units cannot attack, move or use abilities disabling passive Detection and Cloaking. May be removed by a Medic's Restoration**Cannot target Heroic targets**
Tooltip.koKR: Fires a Lockdown round disabling a mechanical unit for 38 seconds. Affected units cannot attack, move or use abilities disabling passive Detection and Cloaking. May be removed by a Medic's Restoration**Cannot target Heroic targets**

Tooltip.enUS:
Cloaks the unit, preventing enemy units from seeing or attacking it. A Cloaked unit will only be revealed by detectors or effects.

Drains 0.6 energy per second.
Tooltip.zhCN:
Cloaks the unit, preventing enemy units from seeing or attacking it. A Cloaked unit will only be revealed by detectors or effects.

Drains 0.6 energy per second.
Tooltip.koKR:
Cloaks the unit, preventing enemy units from seeing or attacking it. A Cloaked unit will only be revealed by detectors or effects.

Drains 0.6 energy per second.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to fire at will. They will engage enemy units within range and chase them as normal.
Tooltip.zhCN: Orders selected units to fire at will. They will engage enemy units within range and chase them as normal.
Tooltip.koKR: Orders selected units to fire at will. They will engage enemy units within range and chase them as normal.

Tooltip.enUS: Increases Ghost sight range by .
Increases the Ghost's energy by and starting energy by .
Tooltip.zhCN: Increases the Ghost's energy by and starting energy by .
Tooltip.koKR: Increases the Ghost's energy by and starting energy by .

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to stay where they are and ignore enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Tooltip.zhCN: Orders selected units to stay where they are and ignore enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Tooltip.koKR: Orders selected units to stay where they are and ignore enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
